name: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction
description:
Pre-order now for the bonus pack: Orbital Decay Bundle!
BONUS: Own Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six® Siege and Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six® Extraction to unlock the United Front cosmetic bundle in both games + unlock 18 Extraction operators in Rainbow Six Siege.
SUPPORTS CROSS-PLAY & CROSS-PROGRESSION ACROSS ALL PLATFORMS
Rainbow Six Extraction is a 1- to 3-player co-op tactical FPS. The elite operators of Rainbow Six are now united to face a common enemy: a highly lethal threat known as the Archeans. Assemble your team and risk everything in tense incursions in the containment zone. Knowledge, cooperation, and a tactical approach are your best weapons. Band together and put everything on the line as you take on this unknown enemy.
